HERO.TITLE: Create invites too good to ignore.
HERO.SUBTITLE: Pick your style, send the invite, and see who’s in, who’s out (and who’s having second thoughts).

FEATURES.TITLE: Features That Rock
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Why settle for a plain invite when you can create a masterpiece?

FEATURE1.TITLE: Make It Yours
FEATURE1.COPY: Customize your invite however you like: pick colors, fonts, and the perfect style just for you.

FEATURE2.TITLE: Pick Your Emoji
FEATURE2.COPY: Choose the emoji that stands out the most—because sometimes one emoji says more than a thousand words.

FEATURE3.TITLE: Handle RSVPs Like a Pro
FEATURE3.COPY: Who’s responding? How many friends are they bringing? And what about the little VIPs? Nothing’s left to chance here: you decide who gets the invite, who can bring guests, and if the kiddos are welcome.
